mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO AS orderNo, QUOTATION_NO AS quotationNo, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDt, EMP_CD AS empCd, PHONE_NUMBER AS phoneNumber, DELIVERY_ADDR AS deliveryAddr, WAREHOUSE_CD AS warehouseCd, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS deliveryDt, TO_CHAR(EXPECTED_PAYMENT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expectedPaymentDt, PAYMENT_TERMS AS paymentTerms, TAX_INVOICE_ISSUE_YN AS taxInvoiceIssueYn, CUSTOMER_CD AS customerCd FROM ORDERS ORDER BY ORDER_NO
